quote: Their friendship was like a wilted bunch of flowers that she insisted on topping up with water. Why not let it die instead? It was unrealistic to expect a friendship to last foreverâ€¦
quote_letters: THEIR FRIENDSHIP WAS LIKE A WILTED BUNCH OF FLOWERS THAT SHE INSISTED ON TOPPING UP WITH WATER WHY NOT LET IT DIE INSTEAD IT WAS UNREALISTIC TO EXPECT A FRIENDSHIP TO LAST FOREVER
